NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Exploration and Investment or the cell corresponding to Gas and Policy?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Exploration} and {Investment} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Electricity and Infrastructure or the cell corresponding to Transmission and Investment?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Electricity} and {Infrastructure} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Electricity and Production or the cell corresponding to Exploration and Technology?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Electricity} and {Production} has a higher heat value.
